column5: I need help. I've got some pics of my trip to Manion but I don't know how to put them on. Ideas?
i can do it myself but i i tried to explain it to you i would confuse you.  wait until one of the techies chime in they will help you.  cheers!
Check out the help thread....FAQ section.  Here's the link http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=20  Good luck!
http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...ic=5797&hl=  Try this link... it is pretty  descriptive
I knew someone would know, but in creating the album it still says the pics are too big and are not resizing. Am I screwed? I'll try your suggestion Jen - Thanks!

If you are running xp and email the pictures to yourself, it should automatically shrink them.  Worth a shot... then just drag them and drop them back onto your desktop out of the email to create the album!  cheers  Jen
You are GOOD! Couldn't get it on a message but did set up an album. Thanks again. I know they aren't the biggest - but it was fun.
